name: Kuju Coffee PourOver Basecamp Blend - 6 Pack
description: Spend more time sipping, and less time gazing sadly at the bottom of an empty cup. With 6 cups of goodness for your next off-the-grid adventure, this will prevent your caffeine levels from plummeting to dangerously low levels.6 individual servings of full-bodied Basecamp Blend, with notes of oak, honey and chocolate.Pocket PourOver™ delivers fresh coffee in moments.Steady-Safe™ anchor system attaches to most mugs.Nitro-Flush™ techn keeps coffee fresh for up to 12 months.Small batch-roasted coffee comes from a family farm in Thailand that employs people rescued from the sex trade, and pays above fair-trade wages.
